ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components.canvas
Class NodeStyle

java.lang.Object
  ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components.canvas.NodeStyle

public class NodeStyle
extends Object

A class containing styling information for a node. TODO perhaps move this over to javax.swing.UIManager

Field Summary
 Color AnchorDefaultFillColor
          The color for the fill in the anchor points for links when a default value is available
 Color AnchorLinkFillColor
          The color for the fill in the anchor points for links when an link is attached
 Color AnchorPublishedFillColor
          The color for the fill in the anchor points for links when it is a published input/output in a macro

          The color for the node's input/output fields

          The color for the node's bg
 Border NodeBorder
          The border used for rendering a node.

 Color NodeNameTextShadowColor

 Color NodeNameTopColor

 boolean ShowEnabledField
          Whether or not to show the enabled field of a node.

Method Detail

installStyleForNode

public static void installStyleForNode(Class<? extends OpNode> cls,
                                       NodeStyle style)
Installs a node style for a specfied OpNode class.

Parameters:
cls - the OpNode class to register the style for
style - the node style

getStyleForNode

public static NodeStyle getStyleForNode(OpNode node)
Gets the node style for a given node.

Parameters:
node - the node
Returns:
the node style for the given node, or the default style if no node style is installed for the given node class (or any of its superclasses)
